author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
I've shared my recruiting link with a ton of people, but no one has accepted it yet. I seem to be the only one who can't do this, so I'm wondering how the fuck this is actually done. Any tips, or am I just very unlucky?

Edit: I noticed that I did get *one* recruit, but that was after probably hundreds of people saw the link. I don't know how people manage to get above 5-10.
body_html:
I've shared my recruiting link with a ton of people, but no one has accepted it yet. I seem to be the only one who can't do this, so I'm wondering how the fuck this is actually done. Any tips, or am I just very unlucky?

Edit: I noticed that I did get one recruit, but that was after probably hundreds of people saw the link. I don't know how people manage to get above 5-10.

title: How do you actually recruit people for Ruqqus?

body:
If you're own twitter, put the link in your bio.

Find a way to talk about it on Reddit whenever you can. It's how I found out about Ruqqus.
body_html:
If you're own twitter, put the link in your bio.

author.bio: I like big brains and I cannot lie.
author.bio_html: I like big brains and I cannot lie.

body:
Iâ€™m actually not anywhere near as prolific of a recruiter as others here.

I have the most success with people that Iâ€™m already talking to and I just give them the referral link and suggest they check it out.
